Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 41st overall pick, by New York (N) in 1965...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 5/31/1968 (Going to CHC: LF R. Zisk, P P. Borbon Sr.. Going to NYM: P B. Lee, CF L. Brock, P S. Shea)...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1970...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1970, off Jim Maloney (CIN)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Cincinnati on 3/2/1972 (Going to CHC: 2B P. Rose Sr.. Going to CIN: 1B T. Solaita, P P. Borbon Sr., 3B B. Pfeil, P J. Kern)...
Injured on 9/17/1972 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1972, going 3-0, 0.36...
